resources.string: System will shut down in %1$ds. Tap Cancel to stop it.
Enter PUK code to unlock phone.
Enter the new PIN code of 4-8 characters.
Enter a PIN code of 4-8 characters.
Enter a PUK code of 4-8 characters.
No app to perform this action.
The power-on time must be at least 5 min later than or earlier than the power-off time.
Start time cannot be the same as end time.

\u0009 is an Android Internet smartphone. It is recommended that you subscribe to monthly data plans for convenient and economical network access. To deactivate data connection, pull down the tray from the top and touch Mobile data.

\u0009 is an Android Internet smartphone. It is recommended that you subscribe to monthly data plans for convenient and economical network access. To deactivate data connection, pull down the tray from the top and touch Mobile data.
Data connection is activated in global roaming mode. Please pay attention to local charges.
Your phone is in roaming state, where the local carrier may charge your data usage handsomely. Activate data connection?
Some apps attempt to use MMS but your phone is in roaming state, where the local carrier may charge your data usage handsomely. Activate data connection?
Your phone is in a new roaming network, where the data charges may differ from before. Deactivate data roaming?
Your phone is in global roaming mode and data connection has been deactivated at phone startup. Data roaming charges are high in this mode. Activate data connection?
Show carrier name on lock screen
Adjust backdrop transparency to adapt to varied wallpapers
Slide two fingers down for quick settings to appear
Show the app icon in status bar when an app releases new notifications
Block notifications released in notification panel
Show the percent of remaining power in status bar
Match brightness between lock screen and system
The lock screen backlight remains the brightest from 08:00 to 22:00 if this check box is cleared.
Auto-unlock the screen when uncovering it
Turn your eyes away from the screen for the video to pause playing
"The front camera can detect your sight: -When your eyes are away from the screen, the video play pauses. -When you stare at the screen again, the video play continues."
The screen stays on when you look at it
The front camera can detect your sight. The screen stays on when you look at it.
Divide the screen for two independent apps
Enlarge or shrink the display size for one-handed operations。
From the home key to the left or right to slide to the left or right button or menu key position
With high sensitivity, the screen reacts as usual when your hands touch it in gloves
Actions, such as picking up and shaking, can control your device
When the screen is turned on unexpectedly in your pocket, screen touches will trigger no operation
"The front camera detects the motions of your eyes: -The page automatically scrolls down when you view upward. -The page automatically scrolls up when you view downward."
"The gravity sensor can detect the device-holding angle: -The page automatically scrolls when you tilt the device up or down. -Pages are switched when you tilt the device right or left."
This feature may fail in low light or when the camera is used.
Allow to adjust the keypad position for single-handed operations
Allow to adjust the keypad position for single-handed operations during calls
Allow to adjust the position of Coolpad keyboard for single-handed operations
When the screen is off, drawing specified shapes on the screen triggers corresponding operations.
Double-tap to turn on the screen
Double tap the screen to wake up the screen
Sense the proximity to call or answer
Wake up when opening the flip cover
After the screen rotation feature is activated, the screen remains portrait as long as you are facing it.
The front camera is used to check your face. When you face the screen, it remains portrait regardless of the holding position.
Place the device on a horizontal surface for calibration
Calibrating... Do not move the device.
Hold Home key to use flashlight in lock screen mode.
Hold Home key to directly turn on flashlight in this mode.
Show the floating quick access box to facilitate single-handed operations
Draw shape c on the screen to open the keypad
"When the screen is off, draw shape c on the screen to wake it up and "
Draw shape e on the screen to open the browser
"When the screen is off, draw shape e on the screen to wake it up and "
Quickly slide up to unlock the screen
When the screen is off, slide up from the bottom of the screen to unlock
Quickly slide down to launch the camera
When the screen is off, slide down from the top of the screen to take photos
Draw shape m on the screen to play music
"When the screen is off, draw shape m on the screen to wake it up and "
Slide horizontally on the screen to switch songs
"If the music application is running when the screen is off, switch to the forward song when sliding to the left on the screen and switch to the next song when sliding to the right on the screen"
Draw shape o on the screen to open QQ
"When the screen is off, draw shape o on the screen to wake it up and "
Draw shape w on the screen to open WeChat
"When the screen is off, draw shape w on the screen to wake it up and "
Quickly slide up to unlock the screen
When the screen is off, quickly slide up from the bottom of the screen to the top to turn on and unlock the screen
Quickly slide down to launch the camera
When the screen is off, quickly slide down from the top of the screen to the bottom to turn on the screen and launch the camera
If the screen is off with unanswered calls or unread notifications, it is turned on automatically when you pick up the phone
Shake the phone during a call to record the conversation
When the Home or app-list screen is displayed, shake the phone to clear the memory
When the File Manager screen is displayed, shake the phone to clear files
Shake the phone when browsing webpages to return to the homepage
Turn over the phone to silence the clock or agenda alarms
"When the phone beeps for an alarm or agenda notification, put the phone face down to silence it. - Alarm - Calendar"
Turn over the phone to stop the play of music or videos
View a photo or select a file and then lash up the phone to share the photo or file
"On the details or file selection screen, shake the phone while tilting the screen toward yourself to share: -Photos - Files"
When the photo view or music play screen is displayed, lash left or right the phone to switch photos or songs
"When the photo view or music play screen is displayed, lash left or right the phone to switch photos or songs - Gallery - Music - Messaging - Email - Memo"
Enhanced after-sales service of China Mobile
You need to record %1$d times. %2$d times have been completed.
Speech failed to wake up, you can use PIN code to unlock the left sliding
Device administrator disallows using a recent password.
Connect at least %d dots. Try again.
How to draw an unlock pattern
Password must contain at least 1 letter.
Password must contain at least 1 digit.
Password must contain at least 1 symbol.
Password must contain fewer than %d characters.
Password must contain at least %d characters
PIN must contain fewer than %d digits.
PIN must contain at least %d digits
Change or disable pattern, PIN, or password security
Choose a method to lock the screen
When Face Unlock cannot recognize you, how do you want to unlock?
Disabled by administrator, encryption policy, or credential storage
Device administrator disallows using a recent PIN.
The selected SIM card supports only 2G service. Do you want to select one supporting 3G service?
If failing to unlock with voice, swipe left to unlock with PIN code.
"Voiceprint recorded. Set PIN code to assist the unlock."
Hover with your finger above the screen to control the phone
Detect the pupil movement to control the phone accordingly
Shake, or flip over the phone to control it
Hover with your hand above the screen to control the phone
When the screen is off, draw specified shapes on the screen to trigger corresponding operations
Control applications by action, or open the screen mode by setting
Cover the screen with your palm to silence the phone
"Hover up or down with your palm at most 10 cm above the screen to silence the phone or pause playing - music, video, - alarm clock , schedule , - calls"
When the phone is placed on a table with screen off, hover across with your palm at most 12 cm above the screen to view status info
When the screen is off, hover across with your palm at most 5 cm above the screen to view time, call, or message info
Hover up or down with your palm at most 12 cm above the screen to scroll through webpages, mails.
"Hover up or down with your palm at most 12 cm above the screen to scroll through: - Webpages - Mails"
Hover left or right with your palm at most 12 cm above the screen to flip pages.
"Keep your finger 12 cm above the screen when browsing webpages, and move left to switch to the previous page and move right to the next page. -Webpages -Photos"
Hover left or right with your palm at most 12 cm above the screen to answer or reject a call
With your palm at most 12 cm above the screen, hover right to answer a call, or left to reject it.
Hover left or right with your palm at most 12 cm above the screen to switch or fast forward

With your palm at most 12 cm above the screen, hover left to switch to the previous song, or right to the next song when playing music; hover left to rewind or right to fast forward when playing a video.
You can use this feature for a camcorder or video chat app.
Start this feature for a camcorder or video chat app.
Swipe from one side to the other
Hover across the screen with the side of your hand to take a screenshot.
Cover the screen with your palm to temporarily silence
"Cover the screen with your palm to temporarily silence: - Alarm - Media - Ringtone"
It can activate the car mode.
3 or more identical characters not supported.
Set a PIN to assist the unlock.
Recording application is running, please exit to continue
Flick up or down with three fingers to take a screenshot
• Speak aloud the preset words to unlock or turn on the screen.
• Speak aloud the same words to start the car mode or voice assistant.
• You can change the words as desired.
Set a PIN to assist the unlock.
Please record in a quiet environment
Slide from the bottom of the screen to show virtual keys
After you launch an app, virtual keys are hidden by default
Set key functions on the film
Double-tap the upper right corner to start
Wake up the password set successfully
Back up photos, contacts and other information to the cloud
Back up system settings, accounts, and app data to SD card
Back up data to an external SD card
"The battery is low. Please charge your phone and restore factory settings. "
Double tap the home button to sleep
Clear all files, such as music files and photos, in internal storage
"Delete all files on the phone's internal storage space,such as music and photos"

"Quickly slide on the screen to open "
